# Government Notice: SSC Dell Isilon Maintenance Contract
_____________________
**Invitation to Tender (ITT)**
**Reference:** SSC-24-00025075
**RFP ID:** BPM020487/25075
**Publication Date**: January 4, 2024
**Tender Closing Date**: January 23, 2024, 14:00:00
_____________________
## Description of Work
The Shared Services Canada (SSC) is seeking to renew the maintenance and support contract for Dell Isilon Storage Systems. The contract period is from January 29, 2024, to January 28, 2025.

## Mandatory Requirements
All bidders must submit their bids through the Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) Procurement Gateway (PG) – Small Business and Procurement (2) (APL-2) portal by the above-mentioned closing date. Bidders are required to register in the SSC P2P portal to access solicitations, submit bids, receive updates, and obtain contract amendments and payment status updates.

## Terms and Conditions
Submission through the P2P portal is mandatory. After the solicitation closing date, the system will not permit any additional submissions.

## Documents

You can access the ITT document and all relevant supporting documents through the PSPC website.

## Award Process
This is a competitive bidding process. The successful bidder will be determined based on the evaluation of the bid submissions.

## Additional Information
For more information, please contact Sandra Ladouceur at 613-302-0766 or 613-960-6026.
